nws_periods.name: Today
nws_periods.shortForecast: Mostly Sunny then Slight Chance Showers And Thunderstorms
nws_periods.detailedForecast: A slight chance of showers and thunderstorms after 4pm. Mostly sunny, with a high near 91. East wind 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

nws_periods.name: Tonight
nws_periods.detailedForecast: A slight chance of showers and thunderstorms. Partly cloudy, with a low around 73. East wind around 5 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

nws_periods.detailedForecast: A slight chance of showers and thunderstorms before 7am, then a chance of showers and thunderstorms between 7am and 10am, then showers and thunderstorms likely. New rainfall amounts between a tenth and quarter of an inch possible.
